description:
The sunflower is the official flower of Ukraine and I am posting one here with love and in support. 

My family has donated to a non-profit organization called @sunflowerofpeace, who provide medical and humanitarian aid that will be used by the paramedics and doctors in the areas that are affected by the current violence in Ukraine. 

Please visit https://www.sunflowerofpeace.com to learn more. 

Do your part and stay informed.üåªBe on the right side of history. 

#notowar #isupportukraineüá∫üá¶ #standwithukraine #sunflowersforukraine

This Thursday we‚Äôre having 2022‚Äôs first open decks on the upstairs dancefloor. Be ready!

THIS EVENT IS DEDICATED TO UKRAINE. ALL SURPLUS FROM THE ENTRANCE FEE WILL BE DONATED TO UKRAINE

The donation will go to Sunflower of Peace Foundation (https://www.sunflowerofpeace.com). Sunflower of Peace provides medical and humanitarian aid that is used by the paramedics and doctors in the areas that are affected by the violence in Ukraine.

RedSky and Red Herring stand with Ukraine. We have donated and are hoping you will too. This is an unprovoked war on innocent women and children. Targeting hospitals, schools and residential apartments. They need help. Donation link on our profile page bio! üíôüíõüôèüèª https://www.sunflowerofpeace.com 
.
.

#standwithukraine #ukraine #ukrainewar #nowar #putinsucks

UKRAINE FUNDRAISER!
@eonesoundsuk has put together a huge compilation featuring loads of fantastic artists from around the globe, to help raise money for @sunflowerofpeace .

Sunflower of Peace provides first aid kits, medication, food, water and shelter to civilians, doctors and paramedics in all parts of Ukraine affected by the ongoing violence.

To gain access to the download please donate ¬£10 (100 NOK) or more to Sunflower of Peace https://www.sunflowerofpeace.com/ and send a screenshot confirming the donation to eonesounds@gmail.com or myself.

My lemonade girls are now tshirts on my website karinbolstad.com under "garments + accessories"!

The Art: This design was inspired by a tweet by author Sandra Newman (@sannewman) that cracked me up so much I had to illustrate it. The image was created with egg tempera on claybord.

"If Life Gives You Lemons, Make Lemonade. Sprinkle some arsenic in that lemonade. Throw a little lemonade party and invite all the bastards who thought you could be bought with lemons."

All profit for this product will be donated to Ukraine relief via https://www.sunflowerofpeace.com

#tshirt #lemons #lemonade #retro #artnouveau #alphonsemucha #ukraineaid
